name: 8-Bit Xmas 2015
overview:
There's nothing more emblematic of the Holiday seasons than the cozy feeling you get waking to a fire and conifer brimming under with presents. That feeling of togetherness and warmth and holiday spirit shared while singing songs of the season with friends and family. That feeling of dominating your friends until they throw the controller at your TV. Ah, such memories!



This year's game tests your abilities when your life lasts only 12 Seconds. The blinky LEDs count down until you die where you stand. Navigate jumping puzzles to reach the exit at the top of the screen. You will need to use sacrifices to build towers or bridges to complete levels. All stats are saved on the cart, so beat your best time or use the fewest lives! Can you escape all 99 challenging levels?
